mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_GENDER, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, NICKNAME, CREATED_DATE, DELETED_DATE, DELETED_REASON, STATUS, ROLE, SALT ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pass}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_gender}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_zip}, #{mem_add1}, #{mem_add2}, #{mem_hp}, #{mem_mail}, #{nickname}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, #{status}, #{role}, #{salt} )
